page.title: 07Population Changes in Dinas
page.content: In {1951}there was quite a lot of people living{Dinas} - to be exact there was{1788}.That figure dropped in { 10}years to {1697}.Then it decreased a long way in {1971}to {1530}.I think people went out of Dinas during that period because there weren't many jobs for them in the area so they moved to other areas to look for work. However,after that,the{1981} census results show that the number increases a great deal to{1749}.I think people came back to Dinas when they retired and came back to live here to enjoy their last years to remember where they lived when they were a child.Also many outsiders came here live because it is such a pleasant area.Experts predict that by the year{2001}the population of dinas area will be about {1935}. {Stewart Roberts
